thread.title: Brazilian Attorney General Moves Closer to Being Reconfirmed
thread.title_full: Brazilian Attorney General Moves Closer to Being Reconfirmed - WSJ

author: Luciana Magalhaes
title: Brazilian Attorney General Moves Closer to Being Reconfirmed
text:
SÃO PAULO—Brazil´s top prosecutor, who is overseeing the investigation into what has become the country´s largest-ever corruption scandal, moved closer to being re-confirmed Wednesday after a combative hearing that included a grilling from a senator he has accused of wrongdoing.
Rodrigo Janot’s current term as Brazil’s attorney general ends on Sept. 17. Just last week he filed criminal charges with Brazil´s Supreme Court against the... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
